thread.section_title: Smith & Noble Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Smith & Noble | smithandnoble.com
thread.title: Cecilia Janney
thread.title_full: Smith & Noble reviewed by Cecilia Janney

author: Cecilia Janney
title: Cecilia Janney
text: This is my second time ordering from Smith and Noble and it was so easy! We redecorated and were replacing the shades we originally ordered from them years ago. They still had our measurements! Richard was so easy to work with, recommending which linings to use, and answering all my questions. Another trouble free experience with this company!
